name: Run Die Repeat (Funky Pepe, MaxTales)
description:
You are the test subject who will perform the ERWIND Test , lead by an IA known as GlaTRES. Will you be able to survive the tests  and discover the truth behind its creator?  

Run Die Repeat is a plataformer in which you have to pass different rooms to face "GlaTRES" the Robot in charge of the tests. This game was made for the #BrackeysJAM2020.2

It´s our second time making a Video Game, unfortunately there´s only two of us who participated in the project. (One of our members had some issues). He managed to pull out a game tho, check it out at  nikkocai.itch.io

Anyway we had a lot of fun creating  this game and hope we can keep doing stuff like this in the future. If you are interested in seeing more of our work , we advise you to check our social networks (both of us just upload art tho)

Max Tales, art and design   :D    Instagram  Twitter

Funky Pepe, Music and Logic   c:   Instagram   Twitter 

Thanks for playing!

If you liked the music, stream it here!
